name: Food attack (The Chad dev)
description:
A simple game where you fight hordes of foods to stay alive for the longest time possible.

-At the end of every fifth wave, the oldest enemy will no longer spawn

Enemies will spawn faster

-Every wave you will get a new enemy that can spawn until wave 10

The number of enemies per wave increase

Note:

I made it to be a simple, light, and fast game that you can play while you have nothing else to do as a way to pass time
